articles.description:
Re @coinbase
paulgrewal.eth:‚ÄÇEarlier today, @coinbase asked Judge Torres for permission to file an amicus brief in the SEC case over XRP.  Our point in pretty simple: this is a textbook case of just how critical fair notice is any reasonable notice of due process under law.  1/3
